Microsoft Announces Quarterly Earnings Release Date
Microsoft to host earnings conference call webcast.
Microsoft Corp. October 16, 2015 4:05 PM
?
Content preferences
Done
REDMOND, Wash., Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Microsoft Corp. will publish fiscal year 2016 first-quarter financial results after the close of the market on Thursday, October 22, 2015 on the Microsoft Investor Relations website at http://www.microsoft.com/investor .  A live webcast of the earnings conference call will be made available at 2:30 p.m. Pacific Time.
View photo
.
Microsoft (Nasdaq "MSFT" @microsoft) is the leading platform and productivity company for the mobile-first, cloud-first world, and its mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.
